short_description: Universal Fit - Fit for variety of three and four wheeled scooters under 48 inch (48 x 22 x 38), so please check carefully whether your model size can fit before ordering

Material - MZS mobility scooter cover is made of premium quality oxford fabric, combined with PU composite material to make the protective cover tougher, compared with 190T and 210T traditional materials, it has more weather resistance, tear resistance and wear resistance

All-round Outdoor Protect - The stitching of the entire scooter cover adopts double-line sealing connection technology, add special PU-coated and UV-coated on the outside and inner, it helps protect your scooters from sun and rain

Windproof System - Windproof buckle and elastic cord design prevent the electric scooter cover from being blown away. The vent system design effectively counters the balloon effect formed by strong wind, makes the scooter keep steady, also accelerate the flow of moisture

Security Anti-theft - There is 4 reflective warning stripes of wheelchair cover, so that you can clearly see the location of the scooter in the evening and prevent collision. The design of front and rear anti-theft cloth lock holes allows you to easily lock your scooter cover, making the scooter cover your best anti-theft device
